text: a couple of reasons why i m still coping to be herei like to think of my medication as a second chance at life  it hasn t affected me yet bc it s only been   weeks  but if it works well  it ll make me feel like i m alive again   then i met someone and the one time we hung out it made me feel joy  i wasn t planning on meeting someone who shares the same interests as me  in a way it s telling me i can t die yet   but the thoughts still haunt me  like right now i am in so much pain and battle in my head   reminding myself that i still have a chance at living   i m just so sad and hurt  nothing can fix the pain  but the brief moments of feeling content are good enough  even tho i just want to escape everything forever   i don t know how i can describe how difficult it is living with these thoughts all the time  my depression feeds it  when will i feel happy  i am using so much of my strength to stay alive right now too  trying to remind myself  i m fighting it so bad   i m so sad
